member.name: M:Encrypter.CryptoProcessor.EncryptString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a string by means of AES. The result gets base64 encoded. Due to the necessary millions of SHA512 iterations, the methods runs at least several seconds in the year 2020 (approx. 5-7s). This method suits for small data such as telegrams, JSON data, text notes, passwords, etc. For larger data, might use the stream overload. Rule of thumb: If the data could be stored three times in the present memory, this method could be used.
member.param: The UTF8 encoded string to encrypt.
The password. Must consists of 6 chars or more.
member.returns: The base64 encoded and encrypted string. The string is ASCII encoding.

member.name: M:Encrypter.CryptoProcessor.DecryptString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts an base64 encoded and encrypted string. Due to the necessary millions of SHA512 iterations, the methods runs at least several seconds in the year 2020 (approx. 5-7s). This method suits for small data such as telegrams, JSON data, text notes, passwords, etc. For larger data, might use the stream overload. Rule of thumb: If the data could be stored three times in the present memory, this method could be used.
member.param: The base64 encoded and AES encrypted string. This string must be ASCII encoded.
The password. Must consists of 6 chars or more.

This method suits for small data such as telegrams, JSON data, text notes, passwords, etc. For larger data, might use the stream overload. member.param: This UTF8 encoded string to encrypt.
